EmailTemplate.name: 06_29_2015 Canon Webinar.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Wednesday Win a Canon Powershot A4000 - See the Datacenter as Canon Sees It – VMTurbo Customer Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-resources/webinar-demand-driven-control-with-canon?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=canonwebinar&utm_content=070115> {{lead.First Name:default=Hi}},
Did you know online shoppers are 40% more likely to leave a web page if it takes longer than 2 seconds to load? B2C companies face the challenge of combating latency and assuring application performance each day.
Join us this Wednesday at 12:00 PM EDT as we learn how Canon U.S.A. assures performance for business-critical applications, maximizes efficiency and prepares for the holidays!
During the webinar, we’ll cover:
- Unique challenges e-commerce companies face in combating website latency and assuring performance of applications throughout the year and particularly during the holiday season - Challenges presented by a complex and growing infrastructure while remaining conscientious of budgetary constraints - How Canon U.S.A. uses VMTurbo to alleviate resource contention, enable greater efficiency and maximize performance in their data centers - How VMTurbo enabled Canon U.S.A. to accelerate the virtualization of its data centers
All attendees will be included in a live drawing for a Canon PowerShot A4000. - The VMTurbo Team <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-resources/webinar-demand-driven-control-with-canon?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=canonwebinar&utm_content=070115>
